price: Momu biara betwam wͻ hͻ. Woi yε nhyehyεε a εwͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ a εbԑyε hͻ.
arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
